Review.Titre: So we had a 50 person charter to pickup…
Review.Contenu: So we had a 50 person charter to pickup for a surprise birthday cruise that was great. On the day we get off the cruise no bus. We call they lie about why the bus is not there and say they will get a closer company to pickup to reduce coming 3hrs from original destination. Time goes by they say the bus is on the way. Nothing. We call a d they are working on an "issue". 3 hrs later still no bus Charter Up says it's still going to be an hour. We booked a shuttle company we saw at the port. It was a mess and never again will we use Charter Up. They also wash their hands of refunds or doing anything to make it right.

Run from Charter Up!!!! LITERALLY RUN! They screwed up itinerary, charged me over $3300 to pick up 54 clients take them LITERALLY a mile up the road to say driver had another job, and had to leave. The driver was suppose to stay all day and transport the clients to a couple places, as well as the next morning and take them back home. I tried to cancel the next day trip since first one was COMPLETELY SCREWED UP and they refused saying need 72 hours notice, even though I literally just booked them 3-4 hours earlier. D+ Better Business Bureau Rating says it all. Read complaints on BBB!!!! Run and I mean LITERALLY run from this company! Management sucks too, they do nothing to fix their screws up, no partial refunds NOTHING. I didn't even sign a contract with them and still got stuck with. $3300 bill for a 1/2 a$$ job that was partially done. Book through bus company directly not this bus broker!!!

Company was happy to take $$ & then never provided service! CharterUp never returned to venue for guest pickup. They said they were coming, but did not. They left us for hours with no transportation. UNRELIABLE & UNTRUSTWORTHY!

We had hoped that this year they would respectfully honor what they said the year before.  Yes, this year, AGAIN, they sent the bus THEY thought we needed vs the bus we actually needed and paid for.  This mistake created additional costs because we had a duty to provide reasonable accommodations for our employees with special needs.  To resolve they offered a minimal monetary resolution.  Very disappointing from a company that claims to have such high ratings.  Please do the research and hope they contract with better bus companies that are serious about the services they provide. JUST a bus is not the goal, the right bus we paid for IS.  We weren't asking for anything free, just what we paid for. We are still trying to resolve this matter 12 days later but they say it may take 30.  Best wishes for CharterUp because we do support companies that want to do better and we hope they do the right thing since this is a good business model if they can improve the communication and QC.  This was strike two for us and not sure we have the luxury to offer a third.  Have a pleasant day and be cautious.

Review.Titre: I wish I looked at the BBB reviews…
Review.Contenu: I wish I looked at the BBB reviews before this. We had our wedding shuttle bus booked with them. Everything was fine on the way there, but on the way back the bus only made one of three pickups at the venue. This was clearly outlined on the itinerary and there was no contact at all from the bus company about the driver not returning. They kept telling us to wait and wait. This was over a week ago at an outside venue! This left our guest stranded in the cold of the night with no plan from CharterUp on how to send another bus. The bus made one pick up at 8:30 and did not return after that for another two pickups. Absolutely unforgivable. The dispatch could not explain what happened. I had to have more than 10 of my guests get out of bed at 1am to pick up and perform the job I hired them to do. They continuously gave us incorrect times telling us to wait and see and no bus ever appeared. This was a wedding night ruined.

We own a preschool in Austin and we decided to use Charterup to help book transportation for the children for some field trips over the summer. First few went fine but the last one wad a disaster. A 930am booking that showed up at 1045am and they still charged us $1000 despite no longer needing or using the bus because our field trip was already missed! Being charged but not delivering the service and then refusing to refund is customer service at its worst. The children were very sad we missed our appointment not to mention the money lost not being able to make out time slot. They don't give a damn.

Review.Titre: ABANDONED TITLE I CHILDREN WITHOUT NOTICE
Review.Contenu: The absolute worst experience I have ever had with a company. The company canceled on us with less than 72 hours notice. We had a field trip planned for our Title I 8th grade students to celebrate their middle school graduation, and this company effectively destroyed the trip. We cannot get a refund for the cost of the trip and the customer service representatives for this company are not only rude, but also completely useless. When speaking with higher ups, they were apologetic, but yet, still completely unhelpful. They could not provide any suggestions, solutions, or support. I will absolutely NEVER allow anyone I know in good conscience to contact this vendor.

Review.Titre: We were stranded for over 2 hrs
Review.Contenu: We were stranded for over 2 hrs.  When bus broke down..your company never reached out to even acknowledge this.

Similar experience to many others on this site: the bus was terrible, dirty, uncomfortable, and very late. It was a very dark cloud over our event and we had to skip one of our activities because of them. We were offered a small refund but hardly a consolation after ruining the event for my team. Avoid.

After booking the service in early spring, I was informed months later that I would need to pay more because the original reservation was no longer available, despite making it. The company passed along all prices to me, they do not guarantee the pricing once you have already made payment. On top of that there was no contact information available for the driver, the number went to someone who had no idea they were supposed to be providing a service. Additionally the bus was over 25 minutes late to a wedding.

Review.Titre: Got shafted less than 48 hours prior to trip
Review.Contenu: Booked the trip in February, paid deposit, paid total amount a week before as required.  Less than 48 hours before the trip, going into a weekend, they called and said, "sorry, the bus company can't take you.  But we've found another one, for ONLY $2600 more than the original quote.  You must confirm right now or we can't guarantee transport."  Felt like I was over a barrel, and while I know there are other companies who *might* have been able to do a last minute trip, we went ahead and confirmed.  It was FRIDAY AFTERNOON when they called, for a Sunday am departure.  This is a bus trip that will be going annually, but we will not use CharterUp again.

Review.Titre: Horrible Experience: Charter Up Takes No Responsibility for Lack of Communication
Review.Contenu: I, unfortunately, had a horrible experience. We had an event for 300 people, and I reached out to Charter Up two weeks before the event for an itinerary update. They didn't inform the local company of the changes so we had to scramble (adding more frustration to an already stressful event), and some of our guests arrived nearly an hour late. When I spoke with Charter Up, they blamed the local company, who in turn blamed Charter Up. Charter Up has never responded to my follow-ups about how to remedy this situation. We spent almost $4,000 on buses for one evening, going to two locations, and Charter Up is avoiding its responsibility as the organizer. I will never be using their services again.

UPDATE: I received a letter from a lawyer via email on behalf of CharterUp stating that I have midnight tonight to take down this review or they will take legal action. This company is using SCARE TACTICs to get rid of negative reviews!! Rent from elsewhere. I rented a 56-passenger bus for my wedding and the driver refused to open the bathroom on the bus for my guests and made them PEE ON THE SIDE OF THE FREEWAY both there and back!!! This is totally unacceptable. We had elderly grandparents and pregnant guests peeing on the side of the road!!! When I confronted them about this, they offered me a $100 refund after I spent thousands with them for the bus. Rent from a company that will actually stand by the level of service they promise...

Review.Titre: DO NOT BOOK A BUS WITH CHARTERUP
Review.Contenu: DO NOT BOOK A BUS WITH CHARTERUP - They are probably a scam company. I booked two different busses with Charterup to do a roadtrip around the NE of the USA. I received a quote from Shofur from each which seemed great - high quality busses with toilets, WiFi, leather seats, and a TV. The bus that arrived was significantly not as described - it had none of those amenities, old cloth seats, looked like it was barely working, terrible suspension. Charterup promises a good bus then bait and switches with a terrible bus. Contacting customer service gets no response or help. If you book with them you'll end up with a terrible bus at a high price and only have yourself to blame.

I would give 0 stars if at all possible. Pay the extra money and go directly to the bus company and cut these people out of the equation. We booked and 100% paid for a bus a month in advance for our rehearsal dinner. THE DAY before travel they call us to inform the driver has COVID, cannot complete the trip, cannot give us the # to the actual bus company to make it right, and left us high and dry. A waste of a company, go elswhere.

DO NOT USE CHARTER UP!!!!We had the worst experience. Although I confirmed our trip details with multiple emails, Charter Up would not provide us with any information about our transportation. Ultimately, it was not the bus or company we selected. We paid in full upfront and we were left with no recourse. Our driver spoke no English so we were unable to communicate with him at all.  He missed multiple pick up times and left our guests stranded. My husband and I spent the entire weekend constantly calling the local provider to try and confirm that our driver would show up. It ruined a special weekend for our family. I also have reached out to Charter Up multiple times with no response. Find any other bus company or booking group — do NOT use Charter Up!!!

Review.Titre: Absolutely do NOT hire these frauds
Review.Contenu: Absolutely do NOT hire these frauds. First, they upcharged me almost $2000 more than the original price they agreed to after I had already hired them, claiming “the company they had hired” for the shuttle service was unavailable. I learned later that they do not contract out companies, it’s all their own drivers, so that was just a lie to extract money from me. Then, on the date of my service, their driver quit mid-run after calling me to verbally abuse me all day. They had also gotten the times completely wrong for the pickups. When I submitted a complaint I was offered an insulting response where they basically blamed me for their screwups and told me I could have a credit for future trips. These people need to be investigated for fraud.

I do not recommend. Ordered three busses for my wedding. One bus was late, one went the wrong way which caused guests to be 45 minutes late to the wedding. Due to the late arrival we were late finishing up and kept one bus behind for 30 minutes. The driver assured us we wouldn't be charged for the extra time since they were late. Well, I received the late bill. When I tried to dispute the charges, I received no acknowledgement and instead, a past due invoice. Book directly through the bus companies. More reliable and will most likely match the pricing. I regret booking through CharterUp.

The bus NEVER SHOWED UP for my brother's wedding. We had 50 people ready to be taken to the wedding and the bus never came. We did not even get a phone call or any notification that it wasn't coming. They caused so much distress, and the wedding had to be delayed. When you book they show you reviews for each bus company they quote you for. However if I saw reviews for the actual company Charter Up I would never have booked with them.

Review.Titre: Beware and read the fine print
Review.Contenu: Beware and read the fine print. We booked a charter bus expecting a bathroom (otherwise we could have rented a school bus for a fraction of the cost). The driver told us the bathroom door wouldn't unlock, so the bathroom was unavailable, both legs of the journey. And, the driver had to be persuaded to pull over in order for people to use a bathroom! And then started pulling away before every passenger was back on the bus. Insane. For our trouble, Charter Up offered a paltry $150 - while insisting they owed us nothing, because the terms and conditions state that they will not guarantee the bathrooms on board will actually work. Any reputable bus company would have made this right. Charter Up is NOT a bus company; they are a broker. They take a hands-off approach if your bus company turns out to under-deliver. Save the money you'll pay as a commission to them and book directly. Clearly they don't screen the bus companies they use; they just want your money.

At first glance this company was a great option for us. We reserved them with no issues, great communication etc. THEN THE BAD SETS IN... on day of reservation, the bus was late for starters, and then my executives that the bus was for did NOT HAVE AIR CONDITIONING. We were in HOUSTON TEXAS in the heat of the day and they came off the bus drenched in sweat. I was very disappointed and contacted the company and they had nothing to say about the issues. No compensation, discounts, or any kind of offering to make up for the terrible experience. I WOULD NOT RECCOMMEND THIS COMPANY TO ANYONE....

We were set to leave on Friday morning at 6 AM. Charter Up called us at 3:00 PM on Thursday and told us the company they had booked for us had a break down and had to cancel. They said they found us another bus but it would cost us an additional $3100. 15 hours notice and they wanted a public school to come up with $3100!! We cancelled but also lost a hotel deposit, parking permit, and ticket fees. We lost over $2300 because of their refusal to cover the additional cost of the new bus- and they offered us NOTHING to compensate.Update- the company saw my review and called to apologize- told me they would be contacting me in a few days with an offer to reimburse if I would take down my review.  When they did call back they offered $400 and a $1000 credit towards a future trip.  $400 is a far cry from the $2300 they cost my students- not to mention the headache of planning another trip.  And obviously, we have no intention of ever using this company again, so the $1000 credit they offered is worthless!

Do not use this company. They don't even have a guarantee charter after we made full deposit. When talking with their support team, the team just told us to wait until on the date of event and told us they will refund if they cannot provide a charter! This is so ridiculous!

The worst company, you can ever deal with. Be aware they are crooks! They show you nice and clean models online to make the reservation and make you agree on their fishy agreement, saying they are not responsible for what you get on the day of service. I do not recommend.

We were planning a high school trip for a title 1 (low income) school in a suburb of Dallas, TX to Orlando last year. We received a quote from Charterup in May and put down a $3200 deposit. We used the price quote we were given to set the total package price for the trip so our students could start saving for it over the summer. The kids came back to school in August excited about the trip. It quickly filled up at the price that was advertised with everyone paying their deposits. In October, we received an email from Charterup saying that their supplier had to cancel our reservation and they would need to increase the price by over 35%. We called the supplier directly and they told us that they had never accepted a reservation from Charterup for our high school. We reached out to initial sales person that booked our reservation and she committed over the phone to honoring our price but later that day we got a call from a supervisor saying that our salesperson was not authorized to commit to that and that the best they could do was a price 17% higher than what we committed to in May which "was their cost". It was an increase per student of over $40 for their trip to Orlando. Eventually, we were able to find another charter company that came in lower than Charterup's best price (but still higher than our original price) and we cancelled our reservation with them. The only good thing about them is that they do have a generous cancellation policy so we were able to get our deposit back. We do a trip every year and we will never use Charterup again. Buyer beware that when you sign up with Charterup they have no obligation to honor the price they quote and they may change the price on you and just blame it on their suppliers, even if it isn't the suppliers fault. Best to work directly with the charter companies so you don't have to worry about these surprise price hikes.

Review.Titre: I tried to give them the benefit of the…
Review.Contenu: I tried to give them the benefit of the doubt but management will not call back in regards to a severe issue with the charter bus company they provided. We reserved a bus with 4.6 stars and 30+ reviews. 2 days before the pickup CharterUp says the bus company canceled so they picked someone else without us knowing.  No communication was given to us about the change, spent $15k for a nice bus with good reviews. Instead CharterUp picked us a lemon of a bus with no AC. We were on a bus for 18hrs in June heading from NC to Dallas. I notified CharterUp of the issue and they have yet to reach out to me after telling me on the phone, “the perk with going through CharterUp is that if a bus breaks down they can use their vast network to get a new bus really quickly.” I hope they prove me wrong but as of today I’d stay clear of them and book direct. **Update: the bus company CharterUp provided us is not worth the money we spent. The bus was held together with zip ties and duct tape. The drivers were incompetent and didn’t know how to navigate (went 1.5hrs off course), drivers made us late to a scheduled event, AC wasn’t working for half the trip, the bus broke down, the bus owner is rude and disrespectful. Stay away from CharterUp, they’re not accepting any responsibility for choosing this bus without our consent.

HORRIBLE COMPANY. HORRIBLE SERVICE. STAY AWAY. We paid $800 to charter a bus for my wife and I's wedding. Date was confirmed and everything seemed to be going as planned. Wedding day came there was no bus. Our ceremony was up on a hill at the end of a trail with no parking, hence why we needed a bus to transport our guests from the parking lot to the top of the trail. We called the bus driver directly and he told us it was his day off and no one told him there was an event scheduled...After this whole shxt storm, we contacted CharterUp to send us a refund. Get this... THEY WOULDN'T EVEN GIVE US THE REFUND. Come to find out, someone on their staff scheduled us for the wrong day and they tried to say that was OUR FAULT for not correcting them. You can't make this stuff up. We are now working with the bank and reporting the transaction as fraud in hopes of getting our money back.Needless to say, FCK THIS COMPANY.

Review.Titre: DESERVES A ZERO RATING/DO NOT TRUST/DO NOT USE
Review.Contenu: DESERVES A ZERO RATING! Just a booking platform and they provide no back-up to the thousands of dollars we paid for Welcome Dinner and Wedding Transportation. Last-minute cancellation by GOGO Buses and no replacement. Left us high-and-dry 25 hours before fully-paid booking. CharterUp LIED and said the bus company was trying to reach me by phone for days and sent me an email. That is an inexcusable false claim (cell phones keep a record of every call in and every missed call). Also, they accepted an additional payment within the window they claim they were trying to reach me because we wanted to add an hour onto what we had booked! Neither GoGo nor CharterUp ever called me to discuss the cancelation or offer options. They confirmed they had my number correctly on the two contracts. They accept no responsibility. They provide no backup plan for cancellation. They do not engage any resources on my behalf. They have held my money in BAD FAITH for three months. CharterUp has cornered the market so one cannot book any of this transportation directly and then they have no backup plan for when they FAIL. Horrid customer service. Promised to call me by 8 pm and never did. I see now that they have cited this same "driver issues" for other customers and have also canceled them by email. CharterUp has a ruined reputation and should stop hosting transportation partners who do not provide contracted services. They like to say they are like "Expedia" but if an Expedia-booked hotel does not accommodate you, you get "walked" to another resort not abandoned. Expedia is awful and they are far worse. CharterUP should not be trusted with your money or guaranteed to show up for your scheduled service. This was for two dates, two contracted service agreements that they violated.

I reserved a bus with CharterUp to travel on June 25, 2022, from VA to PA to attend a play at Sight and Sound. When I reserved the bus, it was my expectation that the bus would be working properly, safe, secure, and comfortable. We paid for a working bus with AC. The AC went out in 88-degree weather, and it was extremely hot and very uncomfortable. However, CharterUp informed me that they do not ensure the buses are operating properly and that's not their responsibility. CharterUp is a 3rd party company whereas consumers can use them as the middleman to reserve charter buses for travel. Therefore, they partner with companies that have non-working buses. This is very unprofessional on CharterUp’s part. I informed CharterUp about the issue and their only recourse was to offer $100 refund. We’re not able to discuss the issue with the bus company because our contract is with CharerUp. Since we reserved the bus from CharterUp they get the bad review for not making sure the buses they send for travel are working properly with working AC. CharterUp decided to partner with bus companies who are not replicable and hold value in putting working buses on the road. CharterUp provides a service and then said it is not their responsibility that the service works? This is a learning experience for me not to use 3rd party sources. When we travel again by bus I will research and find a bus service that I can reserve directly with them. I do not recommend ChartUp bus services and will not use their service again. My issue is not resolved, and I have to call back on July 5, 2022 to speak with a manager.

Review.Titre: Canceled on the day and time agreed
Review.Contenu: bad company, they canceled at the time they had been scheduled to arrive at the place.

DO NOT USE. FRAUDS WHO KEEP YOUR MONEY EVEN THOUGH NO BUSSES SHOWED UP.  What is extra funny is they keep reposting the same reply below every 2-3 weeks to make it seem like they are on it to fix it but it’s now the 3rd time they have responded the same reply about getting back to us in 3-5 days haha…. We booked this in June when they stole our $3,500… it is now Aug, 23rd… 3-5 more days surely.Updated: they copy and pasted the same edit Sept. 1st. Still nothing from them. Complete frauds.They are a middle man who books other random busses to come get you and don't have any accountability. We reserved from them and 1/3 busses showed up. We had 100 children stuck up at camp for 8 hours. We ended up shuttling the rest back ourselves and the 1 other bus came back to get the rest, 6 hours later.They then told us they could not refund us as would have to check with the bus company on what happened. We didn't give money to the bus company... we gave money to them. What happened is between them and the bus company but we expected a refund for the 2 busses that did not show up. A month later they still did not have an answer so we had to file fraud charges with our bank.We also had to pay $1,000 in food for the poor stranded kids among losing a ton of customers due to this issue.Worst company ever and I never complain. They just responded below they are looking into it... So funny as had been emailing and calling with them for months and they would not do anything about it so don't allow that response below to fool you... they ARE NOT looking into it and won't do anything.

Review.Titre: Answer to CharterUps reply…DO NOT HIRE CHARTERUP!!! THEY WILL RIP YOU OFF!!!
Review.Contenu: Answer to CharterUp’s reply…The reservation was under my Daughter’s name Emily B. (the Bride). My credit card was charged in Full on 5-19-22. Our reservation number was 430015.We hired CharterUp to take our Wedding guests from the Hotel to our Wedding venue in May 2022. We had to pay in full a month before the Wedding. The Wedding was on June 4th 2022 & on May 25th 2022 we contacted CharterUp with the final count of people & wanted to change pick up at the Wedding venue from 11:00pm to 11:30pm. We were told to do this through their website & we did that. On Wednesday June 1st, CharterUp called us & said they did not have any drivers at that point for our reservation because the drivers did not want to drive past 11pm. The representative said she would be in contact with us ASAP. CharterUp’s policy is if you do not cancel your reservation within 72 hours of your reservation date, you have TO PAY IN FULL & get no refund. As of Friday afternoon June 3rd (Day before the Wedding), we could not contact the representative after many phone calls & email attempts. The emails said she was out of the office. We had to make the decision Friday evening June 3rd to hire another charter company at the last minute. We cancelled Charterup via email since we still had not heard back from them & they could not be reached by phone. On Saturday June 4th (day of Wedding) we FINALLY heard back via email from our representative at Charterup & she was just confirming that we were canceling. Because we canceled inside the 72 hour policy, we were NOT refunded our money of $1879.00 even though we were told before the 72 hour window that CHARTERUP had no drivers for our reservation & they were trying to find other drivers & would notify us ASAP. We never heard back from them. Our representative tried to get their manager AR_ _R  H_RR_ _ to refund us because she had called us outside the 72 hour window to tell us they had no drivers. He refused!! I tried to speak with the manager on 5 separate occasions & he refused to speak with me each time. It is just a matter of time before the poor customer service at Charterup catches up with them. We have since learned that we are not the only ones that were treated so poorly & in the meantime we are out almost $2000 for a service we NEVER RECEIVED!!Save yourself A LOT of heartache & money & DO NOT BOOK CHARTERUP!!

Review.Titre: Be familiar with this company's TOS in its entirety.
Review.Contenu: Be entirely familiar with this company's TOS in its entirety.

I had a bad experience using CharterUp for my wedding. I used CharterUp to schedule a bus to take guests to my wedding venue from a nearby hotel, and two buses to return guests back to the hotel at the end of the night - one at 11:30pm and one at 12:30am the following day. It's worth noting that CharterUp is not a bus company - they are an agent that provides quotes and allows you to book with one of many bus companies that they work with. While your bus will be operated by another company, your only contact will be with CharterUp. The bus taking guests to the wedding showed up on time, but things went downhill a bit from there. The driver had to ask my guests for the destination and directions, got lost, and told my guests that my wedding venue was closed and that he couldn't take them there. Despite giving the bus an hour to complete a 20-30 minute drive (approximately 8 miles), these guests still showed up just minutes before our start time. Some of these guests were so turned off by this experience that they elected to take Ubers for their return trip - little did they know this would end up being a wise choice. At around midnight on the night of my wedding I found out that the 11:30pm return bus had never arrived. At this point I started to get worried about the 12:30am bus, so I checked into my reservation details. It turns out that the buses were scheduled 24 hours later than they were supposed to be. As a result, all of my guests who needed transportation ended up taking Ubers. While it was annoying spending the last 30 minutes of my wedding worrying about if my guests would make it back to the hotel, it ended up working out and everyone was fine with taking Ubers. I contacted CharterUp later that night to let them know that the bus never arrived due to an error in scheduling. I figured this would be an easy situation to clear up and that I'd be able to receive a refund for the buses that didn't show up. CharterUp responded that they could not refund the money because their cancellation policy is 48 hours. Of course it would have been impossible to cancel 48 hours in advance of the incorrectly scheduled bus, since I didn't realize it wasn't going to show up until day of. They also claimed that the scheduling error was my fault, despite the fact that I clearly dictated over the phone the dates and times of the buses, as well as that the buses were to take guests to and from a wedding. To imply that I asked for a bus to pick my guests up 30 hours after I had them dropped off for a wedding is absurd - we like a good party but let's be real. Ultimately since most of the transacting was done over the phone, I could not put up a case against them to get a refund and ended up eating the entire charge. I can forgive the rough bus ride to the venue - everyone made it on time and they have some funny stories as a result - and I understand how the mistake was made on the return trip. But to stonewall me and not even offer a partial refund or credit is unacceptable. Even if the company wants to claim the error was my fault, to not realize they are partially to blame is absurd - they are the ones who enter the dates and times into their system. The result of this is that I spent close to $1200 for a single 8 mile bus ride, and spent the end of my wedding night trying to get in touch with CharterUp to find out where the buses were.If you're going to book a bus, look elsewhere. Find a small local company that values the customer experience and takes accountability for their actions.Edit January 25th 2022: Within hours of me posting this review on this site and one other, CharterUp started the process of disputing it. Even after providing names, order numbers, and pictures of my credit card activity with CharterUp they told this site that they could not find evidence that I am a legitimate customer. I was eventually able to provide enough evidence for this review to remain active, but be aware that there are likely other negative reviews that you can't see because of the high burden placed upon reviewers to verify their reviews. Also, I find it interesting that CharterUp is more active in attempting to keep their reviews positive through contesting reviews than they are in trying to provide a good service for their customers to begin with.

As with many other reviews, CharterUp cancelled our reservation just 24 hours before our trip. They did refund our money, but made no attempt to help us find another mode of transportation. If you actually need the busses, DO NOT BOOK WITH CHARTER-UP! My advice: use their service to get quotes, then call that company directly and book with them. You'll get much better service from the actual company than you would from a 3rd-party sales company like CharterUp.

CharterUp ruined my wedding. We booked a 50 + person bus for our wedding 2 months out. 6 days before our wedding they email us saying there are no buses in the area and therefore leaving us with very little options on a busy holiday weekend. They were completely vague in their answers, which means they did not confirm a bus 2 months out, and provided no solutions to our problem. Our sales rep also wouldn’t answer any emails or requests to call. The customer service was horrible. I would not recommend charterup for any serious needs. Do not trust the 5 star reviews.

Review.Titre: CANCELED - 3 days before my wedding this…
Review.Contenu: CANCELED 3 days before my wedding this Saturday. Claimed they didn’t have enough buses and screwed us. Other people that they also had this happen to them and I foolishly booked anyways. The reviews are true stay away from them they are absolutely the worst. Did nothing to help, Their team is worthless.We booked 3 months ago and now have 60 out of town guests with no way to get to the venue.Seriously if you want to have a bus literally go anywhere else. Total scamUpdate: they keep attempting to flag my review to Have it taken down but I have all of my receipts so there is nothing they can do. Maybe if they focused on building a better business and not trying to get rid of factual bad reviews they wouldn’t have this problem….

Review.Titre: If I could give this company zero stars…
Review.Contenu: If I could give this company zero stars I would. We had two separate bus reservations for the day of my wedding, the first was for two busses for four hours and the second was for one bus for four hours later that night. We went outside to board our bus around 2 pm but there were no busses in sight. When we finally got through to the company they told us both busses got into a car accident simultaneously and were irreparable. They cancelled our reservations for the whole day 1.5 hours before they were supposed to show up. They claim they called and left a voicemail but we have no record of a phone call or voicemail. I was unable to have any transportation for my wedding that day which consisted of all out of town guests. We had to scramble to order cars for over 100 people. This company should not be used in Denver if you want reliable service. To top it all off, when we called the next day and asked to speak to a supervisor to find out what really happened we were hung up on. DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY FOR YOUR WEDDING OR ANY BIG EVENT IN YOUR LIFE!
Such a lost of time website for renting ! can't believe  I haven't heard of them before.

The actual bussing company you contracted was awesome! However the Charter Up Company was not desirable.  Almost all pickup/drop off times given to the bussing company were incorrect. When quoted a price from the bussing company with the Charter Up charges included, your company still made us pay $100 over the quoted price. Your company also contacted us about needing a hotel room and bus parking booked prior to our trip which was not agreed upon when contract signed and then it was realized no room or parking was needed.  I would recommend that you book through the actual bussing company and not this 3rd party. We used this company for a school trip and they kept telling us “how good of a deal we were getting” however, it was a lot more than if we would have just booked directly with  the contracted budding company.

We used charterup for our wedding on 10/15/22. We paid for a bus to make trips between our hotel, venue, and after party location from 330 to midnight. On the day of the wedding, the bus arrived almost 20 minutes late, so our ceremony was slightly delayed. Our bigger issue was that the charterup was completely unwilling to make extremely minor modifications to our itinerary a few days before the wedding. They referenced a rule that changes couldn’t be made within 72 hours of the date of service. However, this 72 hour rule was not mentioned to us at any point during our booking process. Once they get paid, they don’t care about customer satisfaction. Do yourself a favor, and avoid this company.

Review.Titre: Horrible bus and horrible customer service
Review.Contenu: "First time, we got what we paid for and everyone was courteous and helpful. The second booking was equally as satisfying. The third and fourth were extremely disappointing. The reservation is always easy. The delivery of service is where we were failed miserably. We believed we were getting a full size charter bus and it ended up being half the size. Even though it was half the size, we paid the same amount and booked with exactly the same requirements as previous bookings. The next booking, the bus smelled of horrible sewage and the bus broke down. Charter up, for all of these issues and more, offered a $150 credit toward a future booking. After spending $4,000+, this was hardly acceptable. But this day in age, I should not be shocked that the customer service people gave ZERO care to make it right. Way too many other companies out there and way too easy to book directly with an actual bus company."

Review.Titre: You would be better off booking with a different company!
Review.Contenu: I chartered a Bus through these folks over a month in advance.  The bus was to pick up 40 guest at the Marriott in Raleigh.  The address was provided and was on the itinerary.  The driver went to the Marriott in Durham.  The guest were left waiting for over 30 minutes.  They did not bother to call me to let me know of the mistake.  I had to call them and wait on hold for 10 mins.  I filed a complaint but they never responded with an we are sorry or any acknowledgement.  I will not be using them again and I encourage others to book with another company.  They don't care.

UPDATE: CharterUP has hired someone to assist with  customer support and satisfaction. I received a call to discuss the experience mentioned below and received the apology I had hoped to from the time I filed my initial complaint. We've also received a partial refund -- completely unexpected but very much appreciated. I hope that our situation is unique and that we just received a "lemon" of a driver and shuttle and that others have a more positive experience.We hired a shuttle to transport guests to/from our wedding last month and are extremely displeased with the service we received. I had a great experience making and confirming the reservation, however, our positive experience ended on our wedding day. The point of hiring a shuttle for our guests was to ensure they had a safe and convenient way of attending our wedding. The service received was neither safe, nor convenient. The driver drove over curbs, slammed on the breaks, took numerous on and off ramps instead of staying on the highway, backed over mailboxes and tried to perform a multipoint turn on a two lane, busy road - all of this happened before the wedding even began! The first words we heard from our guests were things like "Thank goodness we made it here alive." Unfortunately, the experience got worse. The radiator gave out on the return trip. The driver exited the bus on the highway in the dark without turning on the hazard lights, which were ultimately engaged by a passenger. They sat on the side of the highway for nearly two hours waiting for another shuttle to come pick them up. What should have been a 45 minute ride took 2.5 hours. Fortunately the replacement bus and driver that finally arrived was very professional and had no further issues. I understand that unexpected things can happen but the worst part of all of this was that when we contacted CharterUp to tell them about our experience, they responded with the contract excerpts saying they take no responsibility for any of the events that happened other than a property damage claim for the mailboxes. I understand CharterUp is not directly responsible for the transportation provided, but you would think that for being a "transportation marketplace" they would care about the safety and satisfaction of their clients.

We used Charter Up in Denver for a wedding shuttle. The customer service agent was wonderful and I confirmed details the week of the event. All was good and I was assured this would be sooth and we would have support on the day of. The day of the wedding we received notice of our Driver in the morning. I attempted to call early afternoon to confirm service time and schedule with this driver to make sure all was in place.  The driver did not pick up, or call back. The shuttle was 10 minutes late for the first shuttle service. We had to call customer support, who told us to call and leave the driver a message (he may be driving - reasonable). The driver never did pick up, just arrived late and was unaware of his job for the day and needed to be instructed by our guests. We had 3 people spending the last 30 minutes prior to the ceremony trying to contact the drive and customer service. Ceremony had to be delayed. The shuttle service that was to be provided after the wedding was to be continuous. However, the driver proceeded to take a nap and needed to be awaken for the first shuttle and refused to take guests an hour later. I contacted my customer service agent, who again was kind and he said he passed my concerns on to their customer support team who would get back to me.  After 3 months and an additional request, I have not heard from them at all. I paid for continuous service that was late and not 100% provided. Would not use a booking service for an event like this again.

Review.Titre: Excellent service to drive our wedding…
Review.Contenu: Excellent service to drive our wedding guests from the church to the reception hall.

Review.Titre: Bus arrived on time and driver was…
Review.Contenu: Bus arrived on time and driver was helpful and professional. It would have been helpful to have his contact info in advance to confirm locations.

Review.Titre: I have used them for multiple company…
Review.Contenu: I have used them for multiple company outings since last year. We had about 40 employees that needed to be shuttled from houston to galveston. The bus showed up on time and the updates with tracking was very helpful and something I have not seen before.

Review.Titre: CharterUp is the best bus rental…
Review.Contenu: CharterUp is the best bus rental website. I like the options of getting to pick a different bus company. Overall things work great, but I fid a few things annoying that I had trouble. Like why is the driver contact only available 3 hours before pickup? And when I tried calling the queue was very high, why do i not have in app chat?

Review.Titre: Good Customer Service Fixing Driver Error
Review.Contenu: *Updating my review as Charter Up reached out to me and they were incredibly kind and wanted to make things right.*They are a third party and do not staff the drivers and they are working with the bus company to hold this driver accountable. Thank you CharterUp for making things right! _______Original Review:We booked Charter Up to shuttle guests from a local parking lot to our wedding at a private residence a year ahead of time. The drive in total was about 1 mile and very simple. The beginning went ok and everyone made it to the ceremony, but the evening took a hard turn.We had booked the returns to the lot from 9-11 pm to go back and forth continuously. Our driver did not come back and pick up guests as per our contract, stating that the residential area he had dropped them off in was "too dark". We lost a full hour of rides and had to call him and plead with him several times during the event to come back and finish out the service. Our wedding coordinator also had to shuttle people back and forth from the parking lot at which they had left their cars while waiting for him. 20+ people were left stranded including elderly handicapped people and people who were pregnant. When he finally agreed to finish out his job, he didn't come down the home's driveway and people had to walk 1/4 mile to where he was in order for him to drive them back to the original pick up point. This location is an incredibly safe and well kept gated residential community, and he had done the trip earlier in the evening - not sure what the issue was but it took away from our evening immensely. To top it off the day after the event we got an automated email that he went “40 mins overtime” and charged our card for the overage.
Most helpful 24/7 service I have booked with. Their website is very advanced in the most convenient ways. I use CharterUp for all of our company events as my first option.
Very reliable experience.Had called other companies and was so releieved when we came across this company. No headachesNo issues

Charterup handled getting my family to the ballpark so we could celebrate my dad's 90th birthday. The entire process was so easy.  They arrived on time and are true professionals. They kept me abreast of everything that was going to happen and I will definitely use them again.

Review.Titre: Our group had a great experience
Review.Contenu: Our group had a great experience. I was looking for a bus for the group for a while and felt the most confident with them.

CharterUP provided an excellent driver and a very clean 24 passenger bus that was on-time for multiple pickup and drop off points for our son's wedding party on the day of the wedding rehearsal and dinner.  The wedding party was transported from a condo to TCU for rehearsal, to downtown Fort Worth Club for dinner and finally to the Stockyards.  I initially contacted CharterUP because I wasn't familiar with any charter companies in Ft. Worth.  The charter process was quick and handled very professionally.  CharterUP reached out to me multiple times to ensure I had contact information for the driver and for them prior to our start time in the event any issues were to occur, which there were none.  The wedding party on the bus all commented on how great the driver was.
Fantastic Service, booking was seamless, the bus was on-time, the pick was on-time, and absolutely no issues with the driver. Great Job, I will be using you for my next charter again.

Review.Titre: understanding and fun to drive with
Review.Contenu: The driver was extremely understanding and was on time and friendly and funny with jokes and was very helpful when the water park was closed and detour the trip to another location for the kids to have fun

Everything about the experience made it worth 5 stars. The price was great, booking was easy and great, the communication was great. The drivers/busses were there not on time, but early, and were extremely kind and helpful. We look forward to using them again!

Review.Titre: The 5 star rating is surely warranted
Review.Contenu: The 5 star rating is surely warranted. Worked with Liz and she guided me carefully through the process of booking for our company event. All the logistics of our trneeds were planned properly to yield the most cost effective option. On the day of the event, they provided support and assisted our planners and execute our shuttle service perfectly. I would definitely suggest using for future
5 STARS overall. Just make sure you have everything about your itinerary ready. I called in and got a quote but you really need to have it organized.
The real deal. I am very happy utilizing their service for easy quotes. I appreciate all the support and how easy it was.

Review.Titre: Our shuttle bus in the Tampa area gave…
Review.Contenu: Our shuttle bus in the Tampa area gave us comfort and easy when completing our trip. The bud has ac as requested and our group was pleased by their excellent customer service
Cannot emphasize how well charterup treated us. Good customer service and the reservation agents guided us through our reservation. Give it a 5 out of 5 service

Review.Titre: CharterUP offered us a selection of…
Review.Contenu: CharterUP offered us a selection of buses and minibuses alongside best equipment to make our wedding an spectacular event. The buses provided were in a very condition and very well maintained. The leather fabric of the seats made it quite extravagant.Everyone enjoyed the ride, included a few guests who we might suspect might organize another event like this. The was a small fee cover cleaning for bringing food to the bus (after the feast). A job well done

I wouldn't give anything less than 5 stars to this company. They were very quick to help, first of all. Then they went above and beyond in helping me. I dealt with several people and they were all very considerate at anytime that I called.I want to then Sara specifically for her thoroughness on everything!Thank you
Great drive - on time - knew the area - very professional and courtesy in every respect. Give him a pay raise.

Review.Titre: Great charter service in tampa Bay Area…
Review.Contenu: Great charter service in tampa Bay Area charter up helped us in our reservation in a timely matter
great booking platform. our charter was booked in a timely manner on an affordable price. very happy with the process and no complains!

So far we have used them to get quotes for the last two events and have had to contact them once each time - all times issues resolved without issues.Each experience has been positive which is why we'll continue to use them. They provide everything I need when searching for buses and are avaible to help. There could surely be improvements especially on the app but passes the 5 star standard

Review.Titre: Very Neat App and Honestly Very Good Service
Review.Contenu: I don't think there are many charter bus companies that have such an easy to use platform as CharterUP. Also, contacting customer service and it's agents is super easy and they are available almost always. If something is urgent, you could request a call back and they'll get back to you in a promptly manner

As a chaperone and school director to a charter school, finding an affordable and accommodating charter bus for our kids is difficult.CharterUP gave me a list of quotes through its platform. It showed affiliate bus companies I could choose from.We had 42 kids and personnel that we needed to mobilize. The platform not only showed quotes but types of buses available including minibuses and charter buses.The list also included amenities and what we could add and subtract from the bus. Overall, the quotes fit our budget and we able to enjoy a great weekend!

Review.Titre: Our June outdoor trip was completed in…
Review.Contenu: Our June outdoor trip was completed in a timely manner. We went to the mountains and ou bus came equipped properly. Very good driver and service overall

Review.Titre: We had a wedding event which we needed…
Review.Contenu: We had a wedding event which we needed to book for a buay weekend. The servuce was impeccable and the driver helped our guest in a proper manner! Very happy

Today I spoke with Andrew and he went above and beyond the call of duty to make sure that I was satisfied. We had to make several changes within the 72 hour no change allowed window. And he was extremely helpful in getting all my details corrected then calling me back to confirm the changes were accepted by the company.

We hired CharterUp to take our guests from Denver to our wedding site deep in the mountains. The driver was on-time to pick-up and drop-off our guests and was a safe and cautious driver. 5/5 service that I would use again!

Review.Titre: Reservations found me a good price
Review.Contenu: Finding a good quote for my 2-day round trip was very easy thanks to CharterUP’s reservation agents. A tried calling local bus companies in the Houston area but couldn’t find a price I liked until I contacted CharterUP. They give me a few choices for quotes and I went with the one I found most economic for our group.

The experience was easy, organized and great. The website is very easy to use with thorough information. Our rep was very nice and detailed, Tori. My recommendation to make the experience easy is to know what your itinerary is exactly along with the times. Everything else is easy to understand and explained along the way.Thank you Tori and Charter UP!
Charter bus was on time and the driver was courteous.  The bus itself was immaculate and comfortable.

Review.Titre: Never thought I would leave a review…
Review.Contenu: Never thought I would leave a review for CharterUp or any bus rental app out there, but CharterUp delivered on what we asked for. CharterUp was awesome and made our first bus charter experience an amazing one. Their system is great and makes choosing from different bus companies worth our time. They representative agent I spoke to answered all the questions that a first timer like us had. My husband and I would love to thank Will.

Review.Titre: CharterUp has been a wonderful company…
Review.Contenu: CharterUp has been a wonderful company to work with. While initially skeptical, we have been very pleasantly surprised with this company. Our original bus company that we booked with turned out to cancel the job last minute. We were frustrated at first but they went above and beyond to make it right. The found us another bus company that was nicer and bigger and matched the price of our original option. They kept us updated during the entire time.A few changes came up on the day of the trip which we didn't anticipate. Charterup communicated with the company. I would recommend Charterup to anyone needing to rent a bus company.

Review.Titre: charterup gave us competitive prices in…
Review.Contenu: charterup gave us competitive prices in the miami area. our reservation was treated fairly by the agents. woupd recommend it to my peers

Review.Titre: Investing on a charter with charterup…
Review.Contenu: Investing on a charter with charterup was really good. Evan helped us through our itinerary and it was the greatest experience. Very impressed

We had a weekend full for school kids to move around a series of tournaments. We needed 3 buses to more kids for our basketball, soccer and football teams. The headcount was about 120 with supervisor and coaches. Tessa, from charterUP made the headaches that usually comes with booking a breeze. She helped me organize the itinerary and alerted me of all the small issues that might come with booking an event like this.Before the start of the weekend, I received an small and a call to ensure from charterUP to ensure everything would be good. The event was a success! Can't be more grateful to this company!

Booking a through the CharterUP platform was a great experience and the staff was so helpful to me through the booking and afterward for planning for our trip. My experience with Evan was five star and he was able to provide support as needed. Our bus was also very nice and clean

We are new to charterUP and could not be happier with our decision. Been through a different bus companies and traevl agents and charterUP is the real deal. Find the costs very competitive to booking directly with the companies but they save you the time and headaches.

Review.Titre: I have been working with Jeff who has…
Review.Contenu: I have been working with Jeff who has been so quick to take care of any need we have.I'm a travel agent and have booked several reservations with charterup.All reservations have been outstanding and we have everything we need to get our customers satisfied.

Review.Titre: Our organization had an event and we…
Review.Contenu: Our organization had an event and we reserved the buses through the CharterUp marketplace. Their team was very organized and assisted with the booking process. The communication was prompt and very transparency process for the company, vehicles and pricing. We had a small change in itinerary which charterUP managed and assisted with. My experience working with them was well deserving of five stars.

Review.Titre: Arrived and set up bus prior to…
Review.Contenu: Arrived and set up bus prior to scheduled time. Was very pleasant and drove well.  Picked us up right on schedule.   A ++

Calling different bus companies to accommodate a local trip to the casino for me and my buddies was stressful. The prices were all over the place and they had a difficult time putting together the details of my trip.With CharterUP, however, The booking agent understood and put together the itinerary in the blink of an eye. I was provided a list of  local bus partners and their price offerings for my trip. Choosing a company to go with from the list was very easy. I like this dynamic and I’d use it again.
Great booking experience and excellent service. Agent was very helpful and shoutout to Dillon. Very helpful with a good quote

Review.Titre: Our group headed to the Mardi Gras Parade in New Orleans. Our previous transportation was canceled because the driver got Covid and the date of the event was inching closer. We were about to give up o
Review.Contenu: Our group headed to the Mardi Gras Parade in New Orleans. Our previous transportation was canceled because the driver got Covid and the date of the event was inching closer. We were about to give up on finding a charter bus for our group until CharterUP gave us a quote. Even though it was very limited, Chad got us a bus at the last minute. The price was high but the sales agent made adjustments to fit in our budget. Great assessment of the situation and great job by their agents.

Review.Titre: Positive Experience Using CharterUP for Wedding
Review.Contenu: I used CharterUp for my wedding in Nahant, MA. We had about 100 guests that needed to be shuttled from Salem, MA to Nahant, MA, which was about a 30 minute trip. I had to make several changes in the itinerary leading up to the wedding, and CharterUp was great at updating the changes and communicating them with the local company. I had a positive experience overall and would recommend them!
Got 3 quotes from charterup regarding booking a charter with them. Very quick to respond and the quotes were all digital making them easy to share with groups

Review.Titre: Reserving our buses for our F1 events in Austin this year was good
Review.Contenu: Reserving our buses for our F1 events in Austin this year was good. They offered a large selection of bus companies. Our customer service agent that we dealt with was also very nice. The insurance part was a little confusing to me, I wanted trip insurance and they showed the insurance of the company. But overall my experience was good.

CharterUP gives the most competitive prices in the market. I loved how the sales agent knows the market in which the trio would take place. For example, my trip took place in Denver and my sales rep recognized the  area and guided me through the layout of the rocky mountains.Thia made my trip very enjoyable as we had a few stops that included the fantastic scenery of the mountains. Very good suggestions. I was impressed with CharterUP

Review.Titre: I have been using their platform for a…
Review.Contenu: I have been using their platform for a while now and have not had any complaints. my recommendation is to get some more buses on your app in Florida please, there are several days that I've ran into that were sold out.

The app really helped us plan our next charter bus. The updated information that was given on the site allowd for easy coordination with our entire team. Big thank you up for helping us get a bus last minute.

The service is pretty dope. It's easy to find a local bus company. There are typically quite a few options. The only recommendation is that there are sometimes too many options and it would be great to sort through them in an easier way. Loyal patron!
“Uncle” Earl (our driver) made our experience the best!! He was kind and friendly!! The bus was on time and clean as well. Our group can get a little rowdy and Earl handled it like a pro!

Always on time and professional. Charterup has been nothing but exceptional to me and all of our guests every time we wanted. Without the help of Charterup I am not sure what we would have done. Josh has been wonderful to our organization and walked us through everything that needed to be taken care of.

Entire experience was great. Provided the details for what I needed and then was given comprehensive options + quotes. Our driver Cesar(ID 607041) was AMAZING!!! He was friendly, on-time, thorough, helpful, and efficient.

There are a lot of bus ompanies out there. It is hard to figure out on your own who to book with. Our experience has been nothing short of 5-star service. We have been a loyal customer and will continue to always be one.

We used CharterUp for transportation after our wedding reception, and we would absolutely recommend them!   Driver arrived on time, adapted to an updated itinerary, and was very professional and timely!  Will definitely use them in the future for business purposes.

Satisfied overall with my experience. CharterUP is doing a great job, the few times I've had issues it wasn't their fault and they were able to straighten it out with the bus companies.I was sold on the idea of having all my bus options available at once.

Review.Titre: Wonderful Experience. Affordable and fast! Agents are fast
Review.Contenu: CharterUP agents are very unique. I called a couple of times to get quotes on 2 separate itineraries and they came out with quotes so fast that I was surprised. They also guided me through different options on how I could adjust the itineraries to make it more affordable.All in all, I would recommend booking through this company. It was pretty easy for me and my group.

Review.Titre: Experienced reservation agent made it easy to book
Review.Contenu: Experienced reservation agent helped me book a trip over a busy weekend. As promised, the bus came with amenities like a bathroom and wifi. Thank you CharterUP, everything went great!

Such a great find. I got a list of all the companies. A plus is they don't charge for the amenities, but they also said that they can't always guarantee it which is annoying sometimes. With that being said, I will continue using charterup for bus quotes and be their fan.

Booking through CharterUP was a unique experience. Their reservation expert collected the info for the trip and a quote was generated almost instantly. Because it met our budget, we booked instantly. 5 stars!
Interesting and amazing booking application. Bus clean and good looking. Our trip to Biloxi came with no issues
Great and reliable charter bus experience. Our bus was in time and the it had an amazing crew and amassing driver

I’m personally grateful to the CharterUP team for helping us book a bus at the last minute. The date coincided with the festival in town and there were no available buses. The agent helped us find a bus at an affordable price.Excellent last minute booking

Review.Titre: Thank you so much CharterUp for giving…
Review.Contenu: Thank you so much CharterUp for giving as a great experience! They were reliable, on time and super professional. We will definitely be using them again for future events. I’ll definitely be recommending their services to other colleagues. Thank you, thank you, thank you!

Review.Titre: This is a review of the purchase…
Review.Contenu: This is a review of the purchase process. Not a review of any bus company. We had a reservation reserved months in advance and the customer service helped me get my money back from a bus company where the driver wanted to charge us more.

Review.Titre: Our group travel was well attended
Review.Contenu: Our group travel was well attended. Our charter bus in the Tampa area was good. Our corporate event had no issues and we were happy
Our driver was excellent!  He was on time, friendly, and helpful with loading some items on the bus.
Excellent service. Our booked bus was punctual and clean. Our red agent was very helpful as well
Greatest experience for our trip. The driver was amazing and the level of customer service was superbly. Recommended and def booking ahsin

Review.Titre: The driver was so polite and friendly
Review.Contenu: The driver was so polite and friendly! He arrived on time and was very patient with our students.

Review.Titre: Very reliable company to work with.
Review.Contenu: Very reliable company to work with.Used them in Texas and had no problems whatsoever. It's great to see someone finally bring quality solution to this industry.

Review.Titre: Very easy way to get quotes on many…
Review.Contenu: Very easy way to get quotes on many companies at once. Great for wedding planners that are looking for competitive or prices. The notifications make it even easier.
The experience was good. We booked on their website without much trouble. The changes to the times were easy also to change. Bianca called us and helped us finalize our booking. No issues whatsoever.

Very easy website. Very informative and looks like the owners have been vetted for quality. Everything, especially the checkout was really easy. This was our very first time and it made everything so much easier, very quick and easy.
Out driver was amazing. Got us everywhere we needed to be on time and safely. The bus was very clean and comfortable
Good, easy, painless. Really the best. Only recommendation is that I wish I could see the results when getting a quote online like I do calling in.

Review.Titre: Our experience with chartering a bus…
Review.Contenu: Our experience with chartering a bus through charterup was pretty easy and the coverage was greatly implemented . Evan was great

CharterUP doesn't cut corners in their customer service. Our trip was on a a busy weekend and we couldn't find available buses to charter our kids to a summer camp. A nice CharterUP agent found us a bus at a reasonable price. So glad we made it happen.. our parents and kids had a happy trip!
Definitely will use CharterUp again for future events. Driver was great, on time, and professional. I'll be recommending them to other colleagues. Thanks for everything!

Review.Titre: An easy company to work with
Review.Contenu: An easy company to work with. The customer service dept is quick to answer all questions I have. So far I recommend their product. Straightforward 5 stars

Review.Titre: Solid and Smooth Event thanks to CharterUp
Review.Contenu: I had a last minute need to book transportation and I was very stressed.  I used CharterUp to charter a bus, and it was terrific.  The driver was great, punctual and professional. I will definitely use CharterUp again in the future, and I will be recommending it to my friends and colleagues.Thanks for all.

Review.Titre: Charter up is thorough and helpful
Review.Contenu: Charter up is thorough and helpful. The Drivers have been incredible and accomodating.

Review.Titre: Very easy to reserve a bus with
Review.Contenu: Very easy to reserve a bus with. It took us 5 minutes to get a quote in and see all the results. They have made the booking a lot easier than anything else out there.I am appreciative of all the help Walker provided to my husband and being available when we needed them.
They did everything well. Very dependable from my call and no headaches at all. Just pure professionalism at all times.

Review.Titre: Bus was on time for all stops and bus…
Review.Contenu: Bus was on time for all stops and bus driver was also very helpful. Bus wad clean and swats were comfotable.

Not much to say about the Charter up app; very easy to navigate. My first encounter with it's sales people was excellent. Every single one of them is on top of their game and is able to respond any questions you may have. Don't be afraid to contact with any questions. They never disappoint to respond

Love this service.I have used it several times. There are many options, which is great. Honestly I can not stress how helpful it is that they show all the results, it saves me so much time from when I used to have to just spend hours trying to find a bus company only to learn they were sold out or just didn't have a driver.I wish they were able to sort the results better by the companies that I have booked with in the past. Honestly that would make my experience that much better. Thanks for creating this company though. Great idea if you book buses anywhere.

Review.Titre: Our bus service was really good and it…
Review.Contenu: Our bus service was really good and it had a very nice atmosphere and service and the driver was very nice

Review.Titre: CharterUP is the way to go!
Review.Contenu: We worked with CharterUP and everything was perfect! Ryan was the professional that we were looking for to help us with our event. Ryan planned everything perfectly and organized it all to make our event a success.
elizabeth helped us throughout our experience chartering a bus. very happy crew at the end ans recommended

Review.Titre: Very pleased with the amazing customer…
Review.Contenu: Very pleased with the amazing customer service. The bus was extremely clean and helped our group travel through the whole trip
CharterUP made it easy to book our trip. Its platform allow us to receive notifications as well as keep track of the itinerary and pickups. Not bad at all

5 star to this company. overall it was all good but had a headache with the company I selected at the end, they  charged us overtime and after speaking with Bianca the bus company refunded us the money.

Review.Titre: I had a chance to visit the charterup…
Review.Contenu: I had a chance to visit the charterup marketplace for booking a coach bus reservation. Their service was great and the staff helped me walk through all the details of the quote

I rented a charter bus for my wedding on Summer of last year and it was a successful event. I'm grateful to Charter up for making this event happen smoothly! The guest were happy and I gotta thank Elisabeth for the smooth planning.

UPDATING my review. After have a small payment issue, I was able to get it sorted out. Took a few days but they got back to me like they said. Thank you to Bianca for helping me out. She was so polite and patient.  First experience and won't be our last.

Review.Titre: Excellent driver, an expert on the road
Review.Contenu: Better-than-expected customer service from beginning to end. 5 stars! I’d like to mention William for the job well done and amazing care while looking up a good price for our trip.

I would have recommended many times to people. My number one thing here is that you're able to get them on the phone any time and they are able to fix the problem. Of course the technology and system is great, but the human touch is great, please don't remove that.  Great job to the people that build it. Much appreciate it and keep it all up.
5 star experience all around. Had not issues and everything was so quick and professional to deal with

Review.Titre: Excelent service for our charter bus
Review.Contenu: Excelent service for our charter bus. Elizabeth helped us through the bookinh and we were very pleased. Thank you

Writing this review as I get done. I haven not rented through this service before and was hooked. As someone who rents a lot of buses and deals with buses across the state this service is a time saver. I had a small struggle getting someone on the phone at 1am but otherwise found it very useful.
Everything provided as promised. Highly recommended mend
